file.content:
{
  "name": "splice-v3",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI services integration",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:all": "npm run test && npm run test:e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css}\"",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "uxp:watch": "uxp plugin watch dist",
    "uxp:load": "uxp plugin load dist/manifest.json",
    "uxp:reload": "uxp plugin reload",
    "uxp:debug": "uxp plugin debug",
    "uxp:package": "uxp plugin package",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "adobe",
    "uxp",
    "premiere-pro",
    "plugin",
    "spectrum",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "dependencies": {
    "@spectrum-web-components/action-button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/checkbox": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/dialog": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/icons-workflow": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/menu": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/picker": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/progress-circle": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/textfield": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/theme": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/toast": "^0.42.0",
    "lit": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@adobe/cc-ext-uxp-types": "^7.3.1",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.49.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.18.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.18.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^2.1.8",
    "@vitest/ui": "^2.1.8",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "globals": "^15.14.0",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.11",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.50.0",
    "vite": "^6.0.5",
    "vitest": "^2.1.8"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ],
    "*.{json,md,css}": [
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0"
  }
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["ES2020", "DOM", "DOM.Iterable"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "types": ["vite/client"],
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["src/*"],
      "@components/*": ["src/components/*"],
      "@hooks/*": ["src/hooks/*"],
      "@utils/*": ["src/utils/*"],
      "@types/*": ["src/types/*"],
      "@context/*": ["src/context/*"],
      "@config/*": ["src/config/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*", "tests/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}

content.text:
Perfect! I now have a comprehensive view of the tech stack. Let me compile the findings.

## Tech Stack Analysis for Splice v3 - Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin

Based on my analysis of the configuration files and package.json, here's the complete tech stack:

### Core Languages and Runtime
- **TypeScript** (v5.7.2) - Primary language with strict mode enabled
- **JavaScript** (ES2020 target) - Transpilation target
- **Node.js** (>=20.0.0 required) - Runtime environment
- **DOM/Web APIs** - Client-side execution in UXP environment

### Frontend Framework and UI
- **Lit** (v3.2.1) - Lightweight web component library for reactive UI
- **Spectrum Web Components** (v0.42.0) - Adobe's design system components:
  - Action buttons, regular buttons, checkboxes
  - Dialogs, menus, pickers
  - Text fields, progress circles
  - Toast notifications and theme utilities
  - Icons from Workflow collection

### Build Tools and Dev Environment
- **Vite** (v6.0.5) - Modern bundler and dev server (port 3000)
- **esbuild** - Built-in minification with Vite
- **Rollup** (via Vite) - Module bundler with custom output configuration

### Plugin-Specific Tools
- **UXP CLI** - Adobe's UXP Plugin tooling:
  - `uxp plugin watch` - Development mode
  - `uxp plugin load` - Load plugin
  - `uxp plugin debug` - Debugging
  - `uxp plugin package` - Build distribution package

### Testing Framework
- **Vitest** (v2.1.8) - Unit test runner
  - V8 coverage provider
  - Global test API
  - HTML coverage reports
- **Playwright** (v1.49.1) - End-to-end testing
  - Chromium browser testing
  - Screenshots on failure
  - Trace recording on retry
  - HTML reporter

### Code Quality Tools
- **ESLint** (v9.17.0) - Linting
  - TypeScript ESLint plugin (v8.18.0)
  - ESLint JS config (v9.39.2)
- **Prettier** (v3.4.2) - Code formatting
  - Semi-colons disabled
  - Single quotes
  - 100 character line width
  - Tab width of 2
- **TypeScript ESLint** (v8.50.0) - Additional TypeScript linting
- **Husky** (v9.1.7) - Git hooks
- **Lint-staged** (v15.2.11) - Pre-commit code quality checks

### Project Configuration

**Path Aliases:**
- `@/*` → src/*
- `@components/*` → src/components/*
- `@hooks/*` → src/hooks/*
- `@utils/*` → src/utils/*
- `@types/*` → src/types/*
- `@context/*` → src/context/*
- `@config/*` → src/config/*

**Adobe Premiere Pro Plugin Specifics:**
- Manifest Version: 6
- Minimum Premiere Pro Version: 25.6.0
- Plugin Type: Panel
- Size Range: 280x400 (minimum) to 600x1200 (maximum)
- Required Permissions:
  - Network access to: Anthropic, OpenAI, Google APIs, Splice API
  - Clipboard read/write
  - Local file system access
  - Code generation from strings
  - WebView access

### Development Scripts
- `dev` - Start Vite dev server
- `build` - TypeScript check + Vite build
- `test` - Run unit tests
- `test:ui` - Vitest UI
- `test:coverage` - Coverage report
- `test:e2e` - Playwright tests
- `lint` / `lint:fix` - ESLint
- `format` - Prettier formatting
- `typecheck` - TypeScript type checking
- `uxp:*` - Various UXP plugin commands

### Package Management
- npm (with package-lock.json)

This is a production-ready Adobe Premiere Pro plugin built with modern TypeScript tooling, featuring comprehensive testing infrastructure, strict code quality standards, and integration with major AI services (Anthropic, OpenAI, Google).
